root.name: Crazy Kangaroo
root.description: OverviewCrazy Kangaroo is an action game developed and published by Gamelion for the iPhone, iPad, Android, and 3DSWare platforms.PlotCrazy Kangaroo stars Barney. Barney is a kangaroo which was caught by a group of poachers. Barney falls from the poachers airplane inside of a crate, but then must find his way back home.GameplayBarney is always hopping, the players job is to make sure every time he lands it is on a platform. The gameplay is very similar to something like Doodle Jump, except the game is played from a top down perspective.On the iOS and Android devices the game is played by tilting it, while the 3DS version can be played using tilt or the circle pad.
